name: The Climb (itch) (Edgard Thobias)
description:
The Climb is a game where the objective is to climb to the top of the tower, taking as many points as possible, taking care not to fall, thus losing everything and having to start over.

The Red platforms have a time of 05 seconds for the player to stay on them, after that, they destroy themselves.

The Green platforms are fixed, allowing the player to position themselves and choose the next one to jump.

Controls:

Movement = W / A / S / D - To move Up, Down, Left and Right

Jump = Space bar

PS: This game was developed by me, for the purpose of testing my knowledge acquired through recent studies on the Unity development platform. So, it is only for learning purposes, and to add to my dashboard.
